Text.Page:
Killian's been sighted everywhere lately. We need to capture that little maniac before he does much more damage.

Checkpoint Ebony is the best place to get more information about Killian.

Belei can tell you how to get there and catch you up on more information.

Melrasa thought I had more information?

Let's see...weird god sharing his body with his dead half-sister on the loose, trying to collect relics for Thulsa. That about cover it?

That's the same info Melrasa hasâ€”the same info we all have.

Anyway, Checkpoint Ebony is just through this cave. It's quite dark inside. Be careful.

Melrasa sent you?

Well, let's see what we can do with you, eh?
